fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 3196: Bella Swan must spawn, along with either 3197: Edward or 3198: Jacob, and one member of the opposite subalignment (Vampire and Werewolf). All subsequent members who spawn alternate subalignments between Vampire and Werewolf.
- Factional chat
- No factional kill
-  If a Twilight Vampire or Werewolf takes no action for two nights in a row, they may become Edward or Jacob respectively if no player with that role is alive.
- If there are no living Twilight Werewolves, a Vampire Fixation activates and empowers the abilities of Twilight Vampires.
- If there are no living Twilight Vampires, a Werewolf Fixation activates and empowers the abilities of Twilight Werewolves.
- All Twilight roles are unique.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take out all who disturb this terrible romance
